scene_description: Dimly lit NOC at 02:17. A rainbow-green wall dashboard claims “All Systems Good” while Hector, still in RHEL cap and night-shirt, slams a shrieking pager on the console. Wanjiru stares wide-eyed at the false-green display; Slack tabs overflow with `PAYMENT_FAILURE_ALERT` messages. The mood is urgent and disorienting.

speech_bubbles.Hector: Green dashboards and screaming users—pick a side.
speech_bubbles.Wanjiru: But the board says authorisation success is 100 %!

narration: Midnight outage: the colour wheel lies.

scene_description: Front view of Geneos console: red blips flash around cpu-bank-01, yet a giant dial reads “OVERALL HEALTH: GOOD”. Manu hunches over the keyboard; Wanjiru stands behind, chewing her lip. Hector leans in from the side, coffee in hand, eyebrow raised.

speech_bubbles.Manu: CPU spikes look normal—maybe the switch is flaky?
speech_bubbles.Hector: Stop admiring averages; start finding outliers.

scene_description: Tight shot of Juana’s terminal showing a stream of `ledger-write timeout` errors—context fields all `null`. Hector’s silhouette looms, pointing at the blank `trace_id` column. Red alert light washes the scene.

speech_bubbles.Juana: Logs give me nothing—trace IDs were stripped.
speech_bubbles.Hector: We built a smoke alarm that turns itself off at night.

narration: The gap between noise and signal widens.

scene_description: Wider NOC view. Hector, fresh coffee steaming, stands over Manu refreshing the ‘All Services CPU’ board. A new mini-stat card on Hector’s laptop shows Debit TPS = 0.0 in angry red.

speech_bubbles.Hector: Why refresh the only metric that isn’t broken?
speech_bubbles.Wanjiru: It’s the only one updating every second…

scene_description: Close-up of Juana beside a large monitor. A stalled red progress bar (“pg_dump shard 07 – 5 %”) sits above a frozen log tail. Hector’s reflection appears in the glass, arms crossed.

speech_bubbles.Juana: Every useful field is null—just noise.
speech_bubbles.Hector: Observability is collecting the right twelve bytes.

narration: Evidence points to a wedged ledger shard.

scene_description: Whiteboard Venn diagram: Metrics, Logs, Traces overlapping at ‘Root-Cause Insight’. Hector draws with one hand while Wanjiru holds marker caps; coffee mug rests on tray table.

speech_bubbles.Hector: Root cause lives where the circles overlap.
speech_bubbles.Wanjiru: So the missing trace ID killed our overlap.

scene_description: Revised Grafana board: crimson error-rate spikes overlaid on trace waterfall. Juana points at a 9 s DB write span; Manu types VACUUM command; Hector nods while Wanjiru smiles in relief.

speech_bubbles.Juana: Green’s gone—the board is finally honest.
